column4: hi! everybody!! .. i was here yday asking why i get 2 users when i run "uptime" in terminal .... now when i run it iget 3 users despite there is only 1 terminal open ... when i run "W" i get my name 3 time! ... is it ok or there is something wrong here!?? help plz!
i got my name 3 times just like "w"
'who' or 'w' show you who is logged in.  "users" in UNIX/Linux are not necessarily people
